        private const long BlockStructureCode = 1L;
        private const int ClassHeight = 1;
        private const int BlockLength = 0;
        private readonly Memory<byte> _writableLocalBlock;
        private readonly ReadOnlyMemory<byte> _readonlyLocalBlock;

        private static readonly BlockHeader _header = BlockHeader.CreateNew(1, BlockStructureCode);

        public new static MyBase CreateFrom(MyBase source)
        {
            if (source.IsFrozen) return source;
            return source switch
            {
                MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks.MyDTO source2 => new MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks.MyDTO(source2),
                _ => new MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks.MyBase(source)
            };
        }

        public new static MyBase CreateFrom(MyOrg.Models.IMyBase source)
        {
            if (source is MyBase concrete && concrete.IsFrozen) return concrete;
            return source switch
            {
                MyOrg.Models.IMyDTO source2 => new MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks.MyDTO(source2),
                _ => new MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks.MyBase(source)
            };
        }

        public new static MyBase CreateFrom(ReadOnlySequence<byte> buffers)
        {
            SourceBlocks blocks = SourceBlocks.ParseFrom(buffers);
            return blocks.Header.EntityId switch
            {
                2 => new MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks.MyDTO(blocks),
                _ => new MyOrg.Models.MemBlocks.MyBase(blocks)
            };
        }

        protected override int OnGetEntityId() => 1;
        protected override int OnGetClassHeight() => ClassHeight;
        protected override ReadOnlySequenceBuilder<byte> OnSequenceBuilder(ReadOnlySequenceBuilder<byte> builder) => base.OnSequenceBuilder(builder).Append(_readonlyLocalBlock);
        protected override IEntityBase OnPartCopy() => new MyBase(this);

        protected override void OnFreeze()
        {
            base.OnFreeze();
        }

        protected override async ValueTask OnPack(IDataStore dataStore)
        {
            await base.OnPack(dataStore);

        protected override async ValueTask OnUnpack(IDataStore dataStore, int depth)

            await base.OnUnpack(dataStore, depth);

            _readonlyLocalBlock = _writableLocalBlock = new byte[BlockLength];

        protected MyBase(BlockHeader header, MyBase source) : base(header, source)

            _readonlyLocalBlock = _writableLocalBlock = new byte[BlockLength];
        }
        public MyBase(MyBase source) : this(_header, source) { }

        protected MyBase(BlockHeader header, IMyBase source) : base(header, source)
        {
            _readonlyLocalBlock = _writableLocalBlock = new byte[BlockLength];
        }
        public MyBase(IMyBase source) : this(_header, source) { }

        protected MyBase(BlockHeader header, SourceBlocks sourceBlocks) : base(header, sourceBlocks)
        {
            var sourceBlock = sourceBlocks.Blocks.Span[ClassHeight];
            if (sourceBlock.Length < BlockLength)
            {
                // source too small - allocate new
                _readonlyLocalBlock = _writableLocalBlock = new byte[BlockLength];
                sourceBlock.CopyTo(_writableLocalBlock);
            }
            else
            {
                _readonlyLocalBlock = sourceBlock;
                _writableLocalBlock = Memory<byte>.Empty;
            }
        }
        internal MyBase(SourceBlocks sourceBlocks) : this(_header, sourceBlocks) { }
        public MyBase(ReadOnlySequence<byte> buffers) : this(_header, SourceBlocks.ParseFrom(buffers)) { }


        public bool Equals(MyBase? other)
        {
            if (ReferenceEquals(this, other)) return true;
            if (other is null) return false;
            if (!base.Equals(other)) return false;
            if (!_readonlyLocalBlock.Span.SequenceEqual(other._readonlyLocalBlock.Span)) return false;
            return true;
        }
        public override bool Equals(object? obj) => obj is MyBase other && Equals(other);
        public override int GetHashCode() => base.GetHashCode();
        public static bool operator ==(MyBase? left, MyBase? right) => left is not null ? left.Equals(right) : (right is null);
        public static bool operator !=(MyBase? left, MyBase? right) => left is not null ? !left.Equals(right) : (right is not null);
